title: The “ZEEP-PEEP test” to evaluate the response to positive end-expiratory pressure delivered by helmet: A prospective physiologic study
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Marco Giani, Benedetta Fumagalli, Francesco Cipulli, Emanuele Rezoagli, Matteo Pozzi, Denise Fumagalli, Letizia Fumagalli, Katia Ferrari, Roberto Rona, Giacomo Bellani, Alberto Lucchini, Giuseppe Foti
